title: Unable to play, bugsplat at loading screen.
body:
Hey, I just recently downloaded League again and I cannot for the life of me get into a game. Every single time I try to start one after champion select the League of Legends logo will pop up, the screen will turn black, then it will bugsplat. Direct X is up to date, my drivers are up to date, and windows is up to date. I'm on Windows 10, I've also repaired the client 2 times and I have done a full re-install, I'm stumped.. Please help me figure this out. Here is what the R3d log says.

replies.body: That's a bummer to hear, though I appreciate you trying!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a closer look.  I also suggest grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach a set of logs for more context.  We'll respond back as soon as we can!

Bugsplatting at the loading screen can be caused by a failure in drivers, hardware, or game files rendering.  I know you've already taken a look at your drivers which is great, but there are a few more things to check as well.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to go through the wring of possibilities, and get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
Okay, I went down the list and I am still bugsplatting :/
